isis.stitle: 7 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - REASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: REASSEMBLY

step1.para: Insert the reassembled drive gear into the case bore, returning the marked tooth on each side of the drive gear to its original position between the two marked teeth on each countershaft. It may be necessary to lift the front of the mainshaft slightly so that the mainshaft pilot enters the pocket in the input shaft. Drive against the front of the input shaft to fully seat the bearing in the case bore.

svcproc.para: Re-install the front bearing cover, shifter housing and gear shift lever housing.
